required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Skeletal Muscle Energy Metabolism in Women With Weight Loss and Ovarian and/or Endometrial Cancer With Weight Loss
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Differences in Skeletal Muscle Energy Metabolism Alterations in Women With Weight Loss and Ovarian and/or Endometrial Cancer Based on the Body Mass Index

collaborator.agency: Inserm U1069 - Team Nutrition, Growth and Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: the aim is to study skeletal muscle metabolism alterations métaboliques associated with weight loss in women with ovarian and/or endometrial cancer according to BMI.

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of muscle mitochondrial bioenergetics according to BMI
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of muscle mitochondrial bioenergetics by high resolution oxygraphy

secondary_outcome.description: Quantification of lipids on electron microscope Type of muscular fibers Analyze of gene expression and proteins involved in 1/ Mitochondrial metabolism 2/ lipid metabolism and 3/ muscular proteolysis by RTqPCR with SyBR Green and Western Blot

secondary_outcome.time_frame: adipose tissue samples taken during surgery
secondary_outcome.description: adipose tissue composition (fatty acids quantification, sterols, steroids) RT-qPCR quantification of molecules involved in lipid metabolism (synthesis, transport) and in inflammation (immune profile and cytokines) RTqPCR analysis, western blot and immunohistochemical expression of markers of transformation into brown adipose tissue in specific milieu, in vitro experimentation on skeletal muscular cells

secondary_outcome.time_frame: ovarian tumor biopsies realized during surgery
secondary_outcome.description: lipid composition (fatty acids quantification, sterols, steroids) RT-qPCR quantification of molecules involved in lipid metabolism (synthesis, transport) and in inflammation (immune profil and cytokines) culture of tumour cells to evaluate resistance to chemotherapy (platinum)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day of abdominal CT scan imaging procedure performed at diagnosis
secondary_outcome.description: assessment of body composition (fat and muscle compartments)

arm_group.description: women with ovarian and/or endometrial cancer and weight loss will have muscle, adipose tissue, ovarian tumor and blood samples
women scheduled for an intervention for benign ovarian/ endometrial disease and no weight loss will have muscle, adipose tissue and blood samples

intervention.description: Blood samples, muscle biopsy, adipose tissue samples and ovarian cancer tumor sample

criteria.textblock:
Case group selection criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women aged 18 years old and more
- Ovarian and/or endometrial cancer
- weight loss related to cancer (weight loss > 5% weight in one month or 10% in 6 months)
- Indication to therapeutic surgery
- Women affiliated to social security scheme
- Women who can understand French and able to sign Informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unbalanced Diabetes
- Chronic neuromuscular disorder
- Any severe uncontrolled medical condition
Control group selection criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women aged 18 years and more
- Surgery Indication for a benign endometrial and/ or ovarian disease
- Patient affiliated to social security scheme
- Women who can understand French and able to sign Informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unbalanced Diabetes
- Chronic neuromuscular disorder
- Any severe uncontrolled medical condition

facility.name: Gynecology Department, University Teaching Hospital, Tours
